name: Accelor Technology Services
tagline: Motivated by Innovation, Driven by Expertise
description:
Accelor Technology Services (ATS) is a team of well efficient and successful champions who are delivering solutions for the world’s leading enterprises. We deliver world-class, innovative, and eminent solutions to our clients. Achieving goals is not only the key to success, but it also requires a ton of smart work to achieve those goals.
A team implementing their skills and expertise, since 2013, in a proficient manner with the maximum efficiency in a professional way along with being pragmatic to finally attain our clients' satisfaction. We are a team focused towards converting your creativity to an innovation with the maximum use of natural resources.
ATS is globally recognized for its innovative approach towards delivering business value and its commitment to sustainability. ATS champions optimized utilization of resources, capital, and talent. And today we are trusted by leading global businesses looking to ‘create difference at the front’ and ‘optimize at the core’ through technology interventions.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Accelor Technology Services E-791, E-Block, Vaishali Nagar
